import React from 'react'; import './wishlistItem.css' const WishlistItem = props =>{ const { removeFromWishlist, item } = props const { title, image, price, id } = item console.log("Wishlist item:",props) return( <>
removeFromWishlist(id)} className='wishlistItem-container'>
{title}
{price}

✖

) } export default WishlistItem;
